Homepagesports.name: Heart Rate Finger Pulse Oximeter + Digital Finger Pulse Oximeter With Pulse and Heart Rate Monitor
Homepagesports.description: This portable Fingertip Pulse Oximeter and Heart Rate Monitor is a battery operated medical electronics device that measures your SPo2 and heart rate PM and displays it right on the Built-in display screen for your convenience. The Fingertip Pulse Oximeter and Heart Rate Monitor measures the saturated level of oxygen in your blood using photoplethysmography, and measures your heart beat per minute by optically obtained plethysmograph which illuminates the skin and measures changes in light absorption.This Pulse Oximeter and Heart Rate Monitor is suitable for physicians, home doctors (mom), medical students, health care workers, athletes, pilots, community sports centers etc. Demand for a lightweight, inexpensive monitor for measuring SPO2 oxygen saturation and heart rate during physically active sports and high-altitude activities is in huge demand, so we present this Pulse Oximeter and Heart Rate Monitor at a wholesale price and directly available to both home users and medical clinics alike.

Homepagesports.description: Storm Xtreme is our best ALL IN ONE formula. When you want one reliable supplement that can fulfill all your needs, it can only be achieved by Storm Xtreme. It is our most advanced all in one Lean Gain Formula. It has unique blend of Proteins, Carbohydrates, Brached Chain Amino Acids (BCAAs), Essential Fatty acids, MCTs, Glutamine and Creatine to benefit sports supplement users at all levels. Storm Xtreme contains optimum quantities of Enzymes like Protease, Amylase, Fungal Lactase, Lipase and Cellulase which helps in easy digestion of Proteins, Carbodhydrates, Lactose, Lipids and Cellulose respectively. It also contains patented Bioprene which is best bioavailability enhancer in the world of Nutrition. Tara Nutricare is the first company in India to research and develop this most advance product that provides results within seven days of its intake. It maximizes muscle recovery after hard training sessions. It contains proprietary blend of highest standard Whey Protein Concentrate, Whey hydrolysate, Whey Protein Isolate and Whey Peptides imported from Europe to fufill Protein requirement of athletes. Strom Xtreme is available as Vanilla, Strawberry, Chocolate and Banana Flavour.
